manas p wrote:

> 
> Hi All,
> 
> I'm reading multiple rows from excel sheet and compare it with DB.For 
> comparison two resuts i'm using junit. It will iterate through a for 
> loop and in for loop i've assert method.But It takes all the assert 
> methods as a single test.I know it is recommended to use one test method 
> for testing one case. But i want a report to be displyed saying which 
> comparison method is failed .How many comparisions are done ? can 
> anybody please help me regarding this?Thanks in advance

I recommend using Fit for this instead. http://fit.c2.com.

If you don't want to do that, you need a Parameterized Test Case. Search 
the archive of this group to find some messages on the topic. Good luck.
